html:
2.12.25  3:43 pm   Do you ever feel like your existence is determined by how other see and/or judge you?

      how we judge each other seems secondary to who we are truly. as time goes by, what's true will prevail and the judgements will eventually catch up to see things more accurately, in the long run

2.12.25  2:55 pm   when i'm listening to music i like to tap out patterns with my feet, it's super fun and exciting. but when i sit down at the drum kit i have a much harder time making the ideas come out as naturally and spontaneously. it's all rigid and hesitant and i second-guess myself and mess up and have to restart and it doesn't sound really good

      this may be a long shot, but, have you tried playing drums while listening to music?

2.12.25  2:50 pm   Do you think in colors, sound, or texture?

      i think in ideas

2.12.25  2:26 pm   Would you consider yourself more "isolated" or more "social"?

      i consider myself 'professional'

2.12.25  12:46 pm   is the reason you wrote "outside" because of you getting tired of writing so many songs about home? if not then what's the reason? (other than you felt like it that day)

      you can't really control what ideas you come up with. it seemed like a solid chorus

2.12.25  12:24 pm   is it a good idea to just sing but never have a coach

      you should be good if you're enjoying yourself but maybe consult from time to time with someone just to sort of make sure you're not breaking yourself somehow

2.12.25  10:58 am   Are u working on a new masterpiece?

      that's not such a bad way to describe it, but i'd also hate to get your hopes up too high

2.12.25  9:56 am   do you think all possible thoughts and ideas have been had already

      it depends on how broad a scale you're looking at. in terms of what has transpired, like, .... on earth in the past few 1000 years or so, then certainly no not all thoughts have been thought, and the majority of them probably have not yet

2.12.25  9:28 am   Every time you're asked the meaning behind a song, you say something completely different. Is it none of them, or all at once?

      what confuses me is which direction they are talking about when they say 'behind'. the meaning is not 'behind' the song, it's IN the song. unless of course i have failed terribly

2.12.25  9:27 am   how do you write a song before deciding on the instruments? i can't figure out how to think of music without the instruments but i am interested in removing this mental restriction, to see what.could happen

      i think as you listen to more and more and more songs, from more and more different sources and time periods, you will start to get the hang of it. like if you watch enough dancers you'll be able to come up with choreography without necessarily caring what clothes they are exactly going to be wearing

2.12.25  9:14 am   What's next for you music wise?

      making a lot of songs and videos

2.12.25  8:21 am   don't you ever have the feeling where you have infinite ideas but very finite skill? i feel like do and it's very frustrating to not be skilled enough to do the cool things i want to do. how do i combat this

      i have a different problem. i have the feeling that there are infinite ideas, plenty of skill to accomplish any of them, but a tendency to require infinite time to accomplish it comfortably. in a way this might be the same problem as yours. maybe the solution has something to do with just simply hearing the other person's version of the problem, in both my and your case

2.12.25  5:35 am   in I like to wear soft clothing (cause it makes me feel like I am rough in comparison)'s title is the part in the parentthesis part of the songs title or smth else

      that's part of the full title

2.12.25  5:13 am   What is 2 to the power of 1.5?

      2√2 i think

2.12.25  4:05 am   Are you happy

      sometimes

2.12.25  2:52 am   i think peace isn't achievable in a sense that, in order to have peace, the people need to agree on a standard of how things should be, but because we're so different and unique, i think it's fair to say that it is impossible. and then it dawned on me, maybe "peace" is this unbalance, chaotic world we are now living in. what do you think?

      i think you're beginning to unpack some of the challenges about the meaning of 'peace'. to be fair, the word 'war' seems equally challenging

2.12.25  2:17 am   Does the past exist, etched into the chronicles of Time itself?

      it has actually done its utmost best to etch itself into space, at present

2.12.25  2:10 am   what to do with all my regrets?

      just keep trying to figure out what you'd rather be doing

2.12.25  1:00 am   I cant seem to find your song that ends with 'im gonna get sick'

      i believe the 'soft clothing' song ends with 'i'm gonna be sick'

2.11.25  9:31 pm   can you become a cat cardiologist?

      i don't think that would be right for me

2.11.25  9:28 pm   What gives you the inspiration to create new and more terrific content?

      someone's gotta do it

2.11.25  5:49 pm   are there any references to Murphy's law, the belief that anything that can go wrong will go wrong, in your videos?

      i don't recall

2.11.25  5:49 pm   I've been working on a phonetic English writing/spelling system and it's been a cool journey. I realized that it's kinda cool to have more than one way of spelling words that sound the same because then you can see that they are different words, but that made me realize that words that are spelled the same but have two different pronunciations are extra wacky, silly examples are "wind" and "wound," what are your thoughts about this? 

      english is truly atrocious in this department. but i think you'll find that in any language, sometimes these things carry some sentimental value. they show that the language has been on some adventures

2.11.25  4:53 pm   As a composer I want to get better at playing piano, but I find practicing really hard and boring compared to writing music. Any tips?

      the way to get better isn't by being bored, or, as you call it, "practicing (for later? who knows)". the way to get better is by having a good time playing. This could be great news or bad news depending on whether you like playing. But even if you don't, there's still great news because you don't actually have to play

2.11.25  4:45 pm   do you ACTUALLY like to wear soft clothing (cause it makes you feel like you're rough in comparison)?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

2.11.25  4:29 pm   Is saying "I'm proud of you" a condescending thing to say to someone? 

      i suppose that could be arranged

2.11.25  2:06 pm   hey just noticed in "and the day goes on" video, how a toaster appears when the lyrics say "i went to the future"
that's a simpsons reference! am i right?

      no

2.11.25  1:47 pm   you ever learned a word from a dictionary?

      i don't think so

2.11.25  1:26 pm   How can I overcome two years of procrastination and start creating the most creative ads out there? Any tips or advice to help me take action? Plessssse

      the past 2 years don't make any difference. there's no need to 'overcome' them. the current time now is still "now" just as it ever was

2.11.25  12:59 pm   It's kind of impressive how some art is designed to hit one's heart when in a certain mental state, don't you think ?

      i think i've accepted that as standard fare a long time ago

2.11.25  11:22 am   what do i do if nobody will listen to me when im right?

      do you ever listen to them when they're right

2.11.25  10:28 am   did the stickman in la de da de da de da de day oh find his house/bought a new house?

      no

2.11.25  10:10 am   is it all as bad as it seems?

      no

2.11.25  9:55 am   What do you consider a 'bad song'? I like your advice for overcoming block when you said to deliberately make something bad. What does this "bad" mean in your eyes?

      if you're songwriting, you might as well assume that the only way to describe something is with the thing itself. so, in your case, make a song you are certain is terrible, even if you don't think anyone could describe why. that is the nature of this exercise

2.11.25  9:24 am   How do you find something fulfilling in life do you have any wise words?

      just look around

2.11.25  9:18 am   What's on the to-do list? 

      oh what the heck, everything

2.11.25  8:20 am   Do you have any music you'd recommend to anyone who may be reading?

      to recommend music i need a lot deeper context than that

2.11.25  8:09 am   will you ever release a full version of "gotmyticketigotmyticketigotmyticketigotmyticketigotmyticket"?

      the full version is contained in the beginning of the 'ground plane' music video. it's probably less than 5 seconds in total

2.11.25  5:20 am   are you counterphobic i.e. instead of avoiding a source of anxiety, you actively seek it out?

      no

2.11.25  5:00 am   They say "no man is an island" but if I float in the water, would that not make me an island?

      no

2.11.25  4:40 am   do the french have a word for entrepreneur?

      yes

2.11.25  3:58 am   is the moon made out of cheese?

      no

2.11.25  3:29 am   any tips on naming things?

      to keep it simple you can just give everything the same name

2.11.25  1:54 am   are love and music interchangeable to you

      no

2.11.25  1:03 am   Have you ever sung in a choir?

      i don't recall

2.11.25  12:51 am   I have some problems with motivation, do you have any tips on where I can find him when he leaves, or ways to bring him back?

      i have no idea what you're talking about

2.11.25  12:48 am   you've expressed your personal distaste (for lack of a better term) for musical albums before. what about concept albums where the songs tie in thematically, tell a multi-parted story, transition into each other, etc.

      i'm surprised i didn't include that clause in the version of this that you read. i'm usually careful to include that. my answer to this is i'd only wish there was a video track. and then, everything is great, with ONE small technicality which is that you probably wouldn't call that an album. so the conundrum, of course, and forgive me for saying this over and over and over and over and over again, the best way to make an album good would be to upgrade it to something that is technically more than an album and no longer elligible to be called an album

2.11.25  12:30 am   what do you like about street signs?

      the streets they represent

2.10.25  11:55 pm   opinions on beavers?

      savvy in business

2.10.25  11:55 pm   what even is music dude

      call me old fashioned, but it seems like it ought to be the perfect venue to demonstrate some wild, real, unbridled consciousness
